üîπ Systemd (systemctl)  
systemctl ‚Äî –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞—è —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ö —Å Systemd (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, Ubuntu 16+, CentOS 7+, Debian 8+).

‚ñ∂ –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫, –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞, –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞

üõ† –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞

‚öôÔ∏è –ê–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã

üîπ SysV Init (service, init.d)
–î–ª—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –±–µ–∑ systemd (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, CentOS 6, Debian 7) –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è SysV Init –∏ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã –≤ /etc/init.d/.

‚ñ∂ –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫, –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞, –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫

service <service> start      # –ó–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å

üõ† –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞

‚öôÔ∏è –ê–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã

chkconfig --list <service>   # –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏—Ç—å, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω –ª–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –ø—Ä–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–µ


üìÇ –†—É—á–Ω–æ–µ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ init.d

/etc/init.d/<service> start   # –ó–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å
/etc/init.d/<service> stop    # –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å

üîπ Upstart (service, initctl)
–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–ª—Å—è –≤ Ubuntu 9.10 ‚Äì 14.10.

‚ñ∂ –£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏

‚öôÔ∏è –ê–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫

‚ùî Let‚Äôs get into the ‚Äòwhy‚Äôs, ‚Äòwhen‚Äôs, and ‚Äòhow‚Äôs:

‚û°Ô∏è WHY the Extension? 
You guys are smashing the farming button hard! Actively playing, having fun. Who am I to judge and take the fun away? Plus, I need some time to make the grand finale the event of the year!! We have big updates, new mechanics, large-scale events, and ecosystem expansion ahead.
Additionally, the market is facing negative sentiment right now, which is effecting partner‚Äôs TGEs. Lets give them a little more time to see nice bullish reversal to ensure successful launches.

I‚Äôm a papa bear, and I don‚Äôt play favorites; you know that! So, I worked out a fair prize distribution mechanic that would benefit all my hungry Sooner babies.

üòÄ Remaining 70% will be up for grabs in the Season‚Äôs final stage on May 28, 2025, at 13:00 UTC. 

üòÄ The prize pool will keep growing, with additional rewards and bonuses along the way!

‚û°Ô∏è Pool Distribution:

üî§ SNAPSHOT #2: My SP from the first snapshot + what I‚Äôve earned until May 28 / total SP from the second snapshot, including the first snapshot‚Äôs balances = my share of 70% 

‚òëÔ∏è Result: I get a drop from both the first and the second snapshots!

name: Lost Dogs Co Eng
message:
Today marks the launch of the first mission for Lost Dogs NFT holders!

We‚Äôre distributing $WOOF and reducing the dog population, hehe. Everything takes place on the blockchain ‚Äì finally using the technology as intended, like an open database.

We‚Äôve designed a dungeon made up of many rooms. In the final room, participants are guaranteed to receive 30M $WOOF. But will everyone make it to the end?

Some rooms hide treasure, others are empty, and somewhere, danger awaits...

NFT holders, are you ready to risk your dogs for a big prize?

üîÖPlayers start in an empty room. Before them are three doors: which one will they choose next?

ü•á Behind one door, treasure is hidden. If you choose this door, an additional 3M $WOOF will be added to the initial 30M $WOOF bank. We want that.

üëå Behind another door, there‚Äôs nothing. A liminal, empty space. Perfect for reflecting on life.

üò± Behind the last door lies death ‚Äì every third participating NFT will burn, oh no.

But all is not lost: you can protect your dog by sending 0.3 $TON as insurance. These transactions also count as votes ‚Äì in the comment, indicate the door number where you think the pack should go. The door with the highest number of transactions will open.

If you don't want to interfere, there's no need to send anything ‚Äì the decision will be made for you, but your dogs will be at risk.

üíé You have four chances to find additional treasure. Once the game is over, we gather all the dogs that made it to the end, randomly select 300 winners (if there are more than 300), and divide the prize pool, which could reach up to 42M $WOOF! Surviving NFTs will return, while the burned ones will disappear into oblivion forever.

ü•∂How to participate?üò∞

Only NFTs with the attributes Background: Sand and Background: Forest are accepted.

Within 24 hours, send 1 Lost Dogs NFT with the appropriate attribute to the wallet address:

EQDzQibS5lJ47hqnA_Rgmct5fp5f15NZgAEmX-5sET_3I4J9

Important: Only one NFT can be sent from a single wallet ‚Äì the rest will unfortunately burn. NFT submissions are accepted until 14:00:00 UTC on 26.02.2025.

To insure your NFT in the first room, send 0.3 $TON to the specified address and indicate the door number (1, 2, or 3) in the comment ‚Äì this will let us know which direction you want to go.

üçΩ Ready to take a risk for treasure? Then go ahead ‚Äì luck is on your side!

- all –≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç True, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –≤—Å–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Å—Ç–∏–Ω–Ω—ã.  
- all –≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç True –¥–ª—è –ø—É—Å—Ç–æ–≥–æ –∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–≥–¥–∞ –∫–∞–∫ any –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ –≤–µ—Ä–Ω—ë—Ç False.

–û–±–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã –ø—Ä–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏:


package_broken = any(

)

)


–§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ any –∏ all –∑–∞—á–∞—Å—Ç—É—é –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–∑–∞–º–µ–Ω—è–µ–º—ã –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω–∞–º –¥–µ –ú–æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∞. –í—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ç—É, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ–¥ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω—ã–º.

name: Hamster Kombat Announcement
message:
‚Äãüéá We are excited to report on the launch of Hamster Network ‚Äì the first-ever gaming-focused Layer-2 blockchain built on TON!

üèé Hamster Network will provide blazing-fast and scalable infrastructure for demanding decentralized apps and games. Crucially, it will enable this at negligible cost per transaction, allowing developers to provide a fully Web3-enabled experience through Layer2 build on TON. 

üì± The network is launched in collaboration with TON who helped make this a reality. Telegram has been instrumental in accelerating crypto adoption throughout the world by bringing Web3 right into almost a billion phones through easy-to-use mini-apps that require no installation.

üíé Hamster Network is powered by the Ton Virtual Machine, and its smart contracts are fully compatible with TON, making it seamless for developers to port their dApps. All proof records from Hamster Network are posted to the TON L1 to ensure its safety and decentralization. 

ü™™ Hamster Network launches with all the necessary infrastructure, including a wallet, a canonical bridge, and a dedicated DEX. Multiple developers are already building novel experiences for the network and we can‚Äôt wait to share more.

üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è We want to battle-test this network. Join this process through Hamster Boost, participate in blockchain testing quests, and get bounties and rewards for your contributions!

name: Libre Blockchain
message:
Bybit Team Panicking - Can't Blame Them 

Won't lie - I'm impressed with the swiftness of their response. But it's clear (at least to me), that they're panicking right now. 

There's $1.4 billion that just vanished out of thin air. They went from new up and coming exchange to major questions swirling regarding their solvency and current liquidity position. 

Hopefully Lessons Were Learned from SBF 

One of his biggest fuckups (that led to his indictment and subsequent conviction), was the false reassurance he gave on social media to everyone that everything was okay and that there were no liquidity or solvency issues at all when they were, in fact, insolvent. The criminality of such behavior lies in the knowledge. 

To be clear -  its one thing if Bybit's exchange operators did the math, looked over their spreadsheets or w/e backend things they use to evaluate their financial health and came to a good faith conclusion that they'll be able to continue operating without issue while honoring any and all customer withdrawal requests without any further unanticipated interruptions. 

But it's something entirely different if they're all sitting in a backroom somewhere saying, "we're completely fucked guys - what do we do? uhh...Beo, go do a livestream and tell the investors everything is ok so there's no further panic to help us salvage what little we have left on hand!" "got it Bob!" -- if they do opt to do such a thing (which I would hope they would not be so stupid as to do), then they will have put themselves in the crosshairs of whatever jurisdictional authorities there are where they're located. And that would be senseless when considering the fact that they themselves are ultimately just as much of a victim as the customers whose funds were stolen from their custody. 

Most Important Task 

More so than updating people and letting them know you're being super-responsive and 'hands-on' is to figure out what the fuck actually happened. Obviously researchers like myself and others will look into this (real ones; not zachXBT) and shed w/e light we can find under this pile...But, until then...that post-mortem is really going to be the barrier that stands between Bybit and any semblance of moving forward. There will obviously be class actions etc if users aren't able to withdraw their funds pronto + other potential legal encumbrances that may arise...so if they are going to move forward on their promise to continue honoring withdrawal requests, they should make damn good and sure that they have all the funds on hand necessary to do so. 

If those funds aren't on hand or they aren't sure - just halt withdrawals. Fuck it. People will panic - but better to deal with the short-term hysteria that will ensue once the headline grabbers really get everyone's attention (i.e., "$1.4 billion goes missing magically on the blockchain!"), versus rushing out bullshit to assuage everyone's anxiety only to stave off an even bigger shitshow when the other shoe finally does drop.
